body.p:
Bowling Green Ky
March 18th 1865
Gov Bramlette,
Dear Sir,
Allow me to introduce to you our friend and physician Dr Porter, who visits your city on business.
He stands at the head of his profession & is a gentleman of high intelligence & honor.
Any attention or assistance shown him will be regarded as a personal kindness to me.
Present my high gregards to Mrs Bramlette, & Mr Turney.

Very Respectfully
your friend
Mrs Ben C. Grider
